titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 901 Pleasant Street in Attleboro, Massachusetts, as the "Max Volterra Post Office Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
10/24/2007--Introduced.
Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 901 Pleasant Street in Attleboro, Massachusetts, as the "Max Volterra Post Office Building."
